description: This feature class represents the location of religious buildings within the City of Baltimore. Personnel in the Mayor's Office track the coming and goings of religious organizations and EGIS receives updates of the list on an as needed basis. The listing is currently limited to Christian and Jewish faiths.

name: Religious Buildings - Shape
